Package index

Taxonomy

Search taxa on DNA repository

get_bold_taxonomy()
Get taxonomic classification of the BOLD taxonomy database for a list of taxa
get_ncbi_taxonomy()
Get taxonomic classification of the NCBI taxonomy database for a list of taxa or taxids

Download

Download records from DNA repository

download_bold()
Download records from BOLD
download_ncbi()
Download records from the NCBI

Others

Additional functions

mergeBarcodeOres()
Merge multiple refdb objects to create a single one
loadBarcodeOre()
Load sequences and corresponding records as a refdb object

Plots

Functions using ggplot2 and ggridges to visualize a barcodeOre

plot_length()
Show the length reduction for the downloaded sequences as a Bar plot
plot_primers()
Show the primers' names as a Bubble plot

Example Datasets

Example datasets used to describe the required formats

example_record
Example records data frame
example_sequence
Example DNAStringSet sequence
species200
Example dataset of 200 species names
